Wappsto: MakeCode extension for the Seluxit Wappsto:bit extension module.
Wappsto.carrier: Input block returning the network name of which the Wappsto:bit is connected.
Wappsto.configureNumberValue|param|max: The maximum value of the number
Wappsto.configureNumberValue|param|min: The minimum value of the number
Wappsto.configureNumberValue|param|name: The name of the value as seen on Wappsto
Wappsto.configureNumberValue|param|step: The increment size of the number
Wappsto.configureNumberValue|param|type: The type of the value as seen on Wappsto
Wappsto.configureNumberValue|param|unit: The unit as seen on Wappsto
Wappsto.configureNumberValue|param|value: The id of the value to send
Wappsto.configureStringValue|param|name: The name of the string value as seen on Wappsto
Wappsto.configureStringValue|param|type: The type of the string value as seen on Wappsto (optional)
Wappsto.configureStringValue|param|value: The id of the string to send
Wappsto.configureValue|param|name: The name of the value as seen on Wappsto
Wappsto.configureValue|param|type: The type of the value as seen on Wappsto
Wappsto.configureValue|param|valueID: The id of the value to send
Wappsto.configure_apn: Configurere the APN to which the Wappsto:bit connects when on cellular network.
Wappsto.configure_wifi: Configurere the SSID to which the Wappsto:bit connects when on Wi-Fi network.
Wappsto.latitude: Input block returning the latitude of the Wappsto:bit. NaN if not available.
Wappsto.longitude: Input block returning the longitude of the Wappsto:bit. NaN if not available.
Wappsto.onNumberEvent: Event handler for Wappsto number events.
Wappsto.onNumberEvent|param|valueID: The id of the number value to handle
Wappsto.onStringEvent: Event handler for Wappsto string events.
Wappsto.onStringEvent|param|valueID: The id of the string value to handle
Wappsto.sendCleanToWappsto: Send a clean command to Wappsto.
Wappsto.sendNumberToWappsto: Send the state of a number value to Wappsto.
Wappsto.sendNumberToWappsto|param|valueI: The id of the value to send
Wappsto.sendStringToWappsto: Send the state of a string value to Wappsto.
Wappsto.sendStringToWappsto|param|valueI: The id of the value to send
Wappsto.signalQuality: Input block returning the signal quality of the network link [0-100%].
Wappsto.time_utc: Input block returning the Wappsto:bit UTC time in seconcs.
Wappsto.uptime: Input block returning the Wappsto:bit uptime. I.e. time in seconds since last power cycle.
Wappsto.wappstoConnected: Conditional block returning a boolean flag to signal whether or not Wappsto:bit is fully connected and ready.
